name: Notion Template – Simple Trip Planner (Doodables)
description: This Notion Template includes A simple dashboard giving an overview about the most important information Database with Tasks related to your trip including templates and checklists Database that helps you to organise the locations you want to visit Database that helps you to organise photos from your trip Database with important vocabulary important for your trip Database with travel memory you can use for journaling
features: A simple dashboard giving an overview about the most important information; Database with Tasks related to your trip including templates and checklists; Database that helps you to organise the locations you want to visit; Database that helps you to organise photos from your trip; Database with important vocabulary important for your trip; Database with travel memory you can use for journaling
